FindingName: VULNERABLE - NO POLICY HAS BEEN SET FOR MULTIPLE ACCOUNTS, BASIC AUTHENTICATION IS STILL ACTIVATED! OR NO DEFAULT POLICY HAS BEEN CREATED, BASIC AUTHENTICATION IS STILL ACTIVATED!
Description: NLegacy authentication protocols do not support multi-factor authentication. These protocols are often used by attackers because of this deficiency.
Remediation: 1. Login to Azure Active Directory portal.azure.com > 2. Select Azure Active Directory > Security > Conditional Access > 3. Create a New Policy > 4. Set the following conditions: Client apps: Exchange ActiveSync clients and other clients > Access Controls: Grant -> Block Aceess > Assignments: All users > Assignments: Users and groeps: exclude to be at least one low risk account or directory role.

References.Text: 9.2 - Ensure Only Approved Ports, Protocols and Services Are Running
